title: Trading Panel
content:
The TradingPanel indicator is an interactive trading panel for the ATAS platform, allowing you to conveniently manage market and limit orders directly from the chart. The panel supports opening and closing positions at the market price, as well as using the "Chase" and "Pullback" strategies, automatically tracks and modifies active orders depending on changes in the best price. The visual interface is presented in the form of buttons for managing orders.


To add and set up the indicator, open the Indicators settings window.


Indicator's settings

Buttons

NameDescription
Market orders Determines whether to display buttons for market orders.
Chase orders Determines whether to display buttons for setting chase orders.
Pullback orders Determines whether to display buttons for setting pullback orders.
Close Position Determines whether to display a button to close a position at the market price.
Close position using chase order Determines whether to display a button to close a position using a chase order.
Close position using pullback order Determines whether to display a button to close a position using a pullback order.

Chase orders

NameDescription
Chase offset mode Allows you to select one of the price offset calculation modes for a chase order.

Options:
  • Ticks
  • Percent
  • Price
Chase offset Defines the offset value from the current price for a chase order.

Pullback orders

NameDescription
Pullback offset mode Allows you to select one of the price offset calculation modes for a pullback order.

Options:
  • Ticks
  • Percent
  • Price
Pullback offset Defines the offset value from the current price for a pullback order.
